official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the unjustified exclusion of the Israeli Chess Federation by the United Arab Emirates from the 1986 Chess Olympiad in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the exclusion of the Israeli Chess Federation by the United Arab Emirates from the 1986 Chess Olympiad is an act of bigotry and prejudice; (2) the United Arab Emirates should allow the Israeli Chess Federation to participate in the Olympiad; and (3) if the Israeli Chess Federation is not allowed to participate, the U.S. Chess Federation should refuse to send a team to the 1986 Chess Olympiad.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the unjustified exclusion of the Israeli Chess Federation by the United Arab Emirates from the 1986 Chess Olympiad in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
